channel.title: A small Inquisitor buff
channel.description:
New Day Ability Revelations (3 uses): Discover if target player visited any heathens. Can be used on the dead.
Currently Inquis has just to either pray for finding heathens or them randomly dying. Adding this ability would help his investigative part, as well as help deducing things.
